steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4is4t","text":"Spin down P. bursaria plate at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":10,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dcnqi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fr6qi","text":"# Ensure that centrifuge is loaded with balance plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"800","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E1D70AC7497611EDA7700A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9avbr","text":"Transfer P. bursaria plate to OpenTrons OT-2 Liquid Handler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":9,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66mt6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75h95","text":"# Ensure that: P. bursaria plate is in position 7; Fresh waste plate is in position 10; and Pipette rack is refilled with P200 tips in position 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":15,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69ual","text":"# Take care when loading the P. bursaria plate into position 7","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":29,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9jd4g","text":"# Tips can be removed from the outer edges of the Pipette rack beforehand, to save on wastage","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bt0qq","text":"Run OT-2 protocol \"96-well (1 at at time)\" using the OpenTrons App. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dg70g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5p1de","text":"# This removes   of supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9f0hh","text":"# You may have to manually remove ~  supernatant from Row F once the protocol has finished (multichannel pipette, in the hood)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ebq5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"39A97E83497711EDA7700A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"75","error":false,"guid":"7BA1CA90497711EDA2851723E1365C89","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

conditions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6l8pu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"60","error":false,"guid":"EE278BBA497711EDA7700A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"120","error":false,"guid":"EE278C2B497711EDA7700A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"240","concentration":"0.1","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"EE278D1D497711EDA7700A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"12","concentration":"0.4","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"EE278E18497711EDA7700A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"4":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","concentration":"0.1","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"06299D34497811EDA7700A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"5":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","concentration":"0.4","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"2A9B7F59497811EDA7700A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"6":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","concentration":"0.0008","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"355A1376497811EDA7700A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"arthr","text":"Return to step 1 and repeat for each plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"197v4","text":"Add   supplemented NCL to each well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"67rlh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9l84v","text":"# Use a sterile square petri dish and multi-channel pipette","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2dpc4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"09E53050498011EDA2851723E1365C89","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"93m0j","text":"Add   E. coli stock (OD 3) to each well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":6,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ccgbq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fckd1","text":"# Use frozen stock plate and multi-channel pipette","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6fsg3","text":"# Ensure layout of frozen stock plate matches the P. bursaria plate ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":50,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"823s4","text":"# You can use the same pipette tips for each REPLICATE (so for everything taken from the same row of the stock plate)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edlob","text":"# Make sure to pipette stock plate up and down ~20 times (10x in the middle, 10x moving clockwise around the edge) before removing first aliquots from the stock plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bpq3c","text":"# Pipette up and down gently 3 times before removing aliquot from stock plate, and after adding to P. bursaria plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":99,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"r2ps","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"8.3","error":false,"guid":"2BA3CCB0498011EDA2851723E1365C89","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7j8u9","text":"Return to step 6 and repeat for each plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c79od","text":"Pipette P. bursaria plate gently up and down ~20 times to mix cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":8,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vrv5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eo8n1","text":"# 10x in the middle, 10x moving clockwise around the outside of the well to prevent cells clumping at the edges","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"s9u6","text":"# This prevents biofilm formation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: RNAi feeding
